title: We may just have gotten a little bit of Warwicks new VO!

embed.description: Based on PBE's state as of August 19th, 2016. Due to their respective audio files missing, the following champions are not in the video: Aatrox, Blitzcrank, Ezreal, Graves, Irelia, Kalista, Karthus, Kassadin, and Wukong.

body:
Banning quotes normally just take a already existing quote from a champions VO.
Warwicks banning quote "I almost feel human..." is not in his original VO it's a new one.
So yeah, what do you guys think?

replies.body: Riot, leaking things in the most hidden of ways.

{{champion:7}} 
Tricky aren't you?

Seems Warwick's VGU's coming along smoothly if he's already got some of his VO nailed down. 

Yorick and Warwick VGU teasers in the same day. Wow, what a world we live in!

Kinda wondering why they didn't preview Yorick's new VO. 

Unless he either isn't getting one or I can't tell the difference.

He will be, this is almost certainly a mess up on Riot's end and completely unintentional. All new champions and reworked champions will be getting ban lines in their new VO, so seeing Warwick's line now is indicative of his rework being well underway, far more so than I ever expected considering Ryze's update came out so recently. 

So basically take this as someone gathering files together and getting the Warwick file from the wrong place, not realizing, and this occurring.

On Yorick though I wouldn't be surprised if they kept that line in his new VO. It's pretty iconic to him.

Well it could be that the WW rework is just coming along well. the Ryze rework took 6 months and they spent all that time on nailing down that they wouldnt need to go back. the WW rework has been picked up and shelved off and on for about 2 years now by my count with minor tweaks here and there over time.

With all the sporadic effort that was previously placed on him and the possibility that he just came together well (and that there are multiple update teams that work simultaneously obviously) its not too far fetched that he could be moving along so quickly.

Azir took 1.5 years to create. original brand took 1 month. the gap between the two releases is considerable, but brand also took much less work to fix post release than the 1.5 year creation Azir was. Some champs just kinda come together.
That or they decided to use his new banning quote for him right now instead of waiting for his VGU.

Hate to burst everyone's bubble, but that's just a unprocessed and unused line from his previous VO.

Sorry everyone got so excited :(

... you still have stocked somewhere unused VO lines for a champion like Warwick!? That got released in 2009?

Holy hell i heard many times of game assets getting lost and i am surprised that something like this got preserved so much. You placed the hard drive containing this clip in a bank?
I mean, you can still find files for cancelled champions and old items and what not in the files. It's actually a lot of unused junk.

That stuff gets removed quite quickly however. Plus, pre - production stuff will likely never be put in the public client, so you can' t find much of that junk by datamining  a client that gets frequently updated as lol ( in contrast to boxed games for example ).

Nope, they remove literally nothing from the gamefiles.

You can mod your game to purchase almost any item that has ever existed, just dont expect your account to last very long.

Man you guys need to learn how to leak content properly. For example, you should snap a selfie with Yorick splashes in the background. Now that's a fair and balanced way to leak content. 

I can give your team more tips/ advice on the proper conventions and procedures to leak content to the public. Just ask the lead designer on ww to msg me, I'm sure i can teach him how to properly leak stuff

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=rdEJJrda,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-08-22T14:45:15.079+0000)
>
> Hate to burst everyone's bubble, but that's just a unprocessed and unused line from his previous VO.
> 
> Sorry everyone got so excited :(

What do you mean previous VO? There's only ever been one Warwick. There was never a different Warwick before him. Besides, I like it. It still sounds like a Werewolf, but it sounds less generic, and more human-like, too.
They clearly mean it is from his current VO, being that they are in the works of a brand new Warwick update (with new VO, ect) this is kind of considered his previous vo.

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=rdEJJrda,comment-id=000900080000,timestamp=2016-09-01T22:19:02.780+0000)
>
> They clearly mean it is from his current VO, being that they are in the works of a brand new Warwick update (with new VO, ect) this is kind of considered his previous vo.

But it sounds different from all of Warwick's other quotes, though?

> [{quoted}](name=Carnage068,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=rdEJJrda,comment-id=0009000800000000,timestamp=2016-09-03T01:52:33.030+0000)
>
> But it sounds different from all of Warwick's other quotes, though?

They said it was unprocessed, so think like Arclight Vel's voice, it is normal vel without the void-y voice filter.

> [{quoted}](name=Dragonsfang16,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=rdEJJrda,comment-id=00090008000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-03T04:16:19.220+0000)
>
> They said it was unprocessed, so think like Arclight Vel's voice, it is normal vel without the void-y voice filter.

Oh... You mean the voice actor for Warwick doesn't actually sound like that? It doesn't seem too far fetched for Riot, or any company, for that matter, to get somebody with a voice like that. For champions like Cho'Gath and Thresh, it's quite obvious, but Warwick? Wow.

Also, I think Arclight Vel'Koz's voice is slightly modified.
Yeah and well it does have a different feel, so maybe it's one of the reasons why it wasn't included.

Oh nooooooooooo :(

If I may ask, how smoothly is Warwick's rework moving along? No specifics, please, just a general comment :)

> [{quoted}](name=AlistarMilking,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=rdEJJrda,comment-id=00090007,timestamp=2016-08-23T00:54:24.480+0000)
>
> Oh nooooooooooo :(
> 
> If I may ask, how smoothly is Warwick's rework moving along? No specifics, please, just a general comment :)

Since CertainlyT is making him, he's probably somewhere between release Kalista and release Darius and no one in balance has any clue what direction to even begin going to make him not create armageddon on launch.

Sorry if you cant answer this, and i understand if you cant. Why do champions with 7 voicelines have unused vo? i feel like any or all vo that could be used on older champions (like kayle or nunu) would be great! If you cant answer that i would just like to know the process of what vo stays and what vo goes, i heard jihn has like 10 minutes of unused, and that some of kleds vo was too violent lol

Such a shame 
https://media1.giphy.com/media/diLcxS9Sdqq8E/giphy.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=rdEJJrda,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-08-22T14:45:15.079+0000)
>
> Hate to burst everyone's bubble, but that's just a unprocessed and unused line from his previous VO.
> 
> Sorry everyone got so excited :(

NICE TRY{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Dammit riot

Dont you lie to me
http://imgur.com/NxjKHhB

Love malphite's though. 

"You will lose."

Just BRUTAL!
Dr Mundo's ban quote LOL

"Audio files missing for Wukong"? Why would those be missing? Unless... O.o

# Wukong VO update confirmed
 
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/819/702/5be.gif
Oh my god that voice sounds awesome, almost like John Noble's Scarecrow from Arkham Knight.
Also kata's quote , i don't think she has it. "Is that fear i smell?"
yes she does its a attack quote

I think that's the same voice actor, but he isn't trying quite as hard so it doesn't sound as goofy.
Good to know Riot hasn't forgotten the old VA's.
Well they did say that new champs and VGUs would get quotes specifically for bans. I'm pretty excited because WW is my favorite jungler
